schema.title: Unit Settings
schema.description: Settings that describe the behaviour and formatting of rewards corresponding to the configured unit or unit pattern

id.title: Reward Unit Settings Id
id.description: A unique identifier generated by combining reward type and unit or unit pattern (e.g. CREDIT/USD)

config.title: Unit Settings Configuration
config.description: Behaviour and formatting supported by this unit setting

rewardModifications.title: Reward Modifications
rewardModifications.description: The modifications supported by rewards applicable for this unit setting

isCancellable.title: Is Cancellable
isCancellable.description: Indicates whether rewards of this unit can be cancelled via SaaSquatch API/Portal

isRedeemable.title: Is Redeemable
isRedeemable.description: Indicates whether rewards of this unit can be redeemed via SaaSquatch API/Portal

isExpirable.title: Is Expirable
isExpirable.description: Indicates whether expiration is applicable to this reward of this unit

supportsCurrencies.title: Supports Currencies
supportsCurrencies.description: Whether this unit supports multi-currencies. false by default.

translatableConfig.title: Translatable Configuration
translatableConfig.description: Locale-specific configuration for rewards of this unit

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this reward unit

prettyValueFormat.title: Pretty Value Format
prettyValueFormat.description: Format for prettyValue for rewards of this unit

templateType.title: Template Type
templateType.description: The type of this template, "ICU" by default.

template.title: Template
template.description: The template string for reward prettyValue
